sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState } from "react"; import { useSetRecoilState ,useRecoilState} from 'recoil' export function PatientViewVaccine() { const [userinfo, setUserinfo] = useRecoilState(userType); patient=userinfo console.log("patient: ",patient["patient_id"]) const [patientsInfo, setPatientsInfo] = useState([]); var myHeaders = new Headers(); myHeaders.append("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", "*") myHeaders.append("Content-Type", "application/json"); // var requestOptions = { // method: 'GET', // headers: myHeaders, // mode: 'cors', // redirect: 'follow' // }; useEffect(() => { console.log(patient["patient_id"]) const data={"id":patient["patient_id"]} console.log(data) var requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: myHeaders, mode: 'cors', redirect: 'follow', body: JSON.stringify( data ) }; fetch("http://localhost:3000/getPatientAppointmentsDetails", requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(result => {setPatientsInfo(result) ;console.log(result) }) .catch(error => console.log('error', error)); }, []); return( <>

Patient Profile

This is some information about the patient.

Name
{patient["f_name"]} {patient["mi"]} {patient["l_name"]}
Patient ID
{patient["patient_id"]}
Phone Number
{patient["phone_no"]}
Address
{patient["address"]}

Vaccination Schedule

Upcoming Appointments:

{patientsInfo.map((pInfo)=>pInfo["vaccine_record_status"]==="Incomplete" && )}
Date Time Vaccine
{pInfo["date"]} {pInfo["start_time"]} {pInfo["name"]} by {pInfo["company_name"]}

Vaccination History:

{patientsInfo.map((pInfo)=>pInfo["vaccine_record_status"]==="Completed" && )}
Date Time Vaccine
{pInfo["date"]} {pInfo["start_time"]} {pInfo["name"]} by {pInfo["company_name"]}
{/*
Date
{pInfo["date"]}
Time
{pInfo["start_time"]}
Vaccine
{pInfo["name"]} by {pInfo["company_name"]}
*/}
)}
